/usr/bin/cc     CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/solar_system.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/engine/camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/engine/Engine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/engine/EventHandler.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/engine/glmUtils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/engine/shader_object.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/engine/texture_object.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/engine/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/geometry/sphere.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/geometry/cube.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/models/earth.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/models/moon.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/models/skybox.cpp.o CMakeFiles/solar_system.dir/src/models/sun.cpp.o  -o solar_system -rdynamic -lboost_filesystem -lboost_system -lGLU -lGL -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  -lSDL2 -lGLU -lGLEW -lSDL2_image -lGL -lGLEW -lSDL2_image -lstdc++ -lm
